description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/01216/FUL, Allowed on Appeal APP/Z5630/W/20/3260562 (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of new residential building comprising 6no.x dwellings with associated bins, cycle store, parking and dropped kerb widening to side and rear of site.) to reflect installation of solar panels on the roof.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 20/01216/FUL (allowed on appeal ref. APP/Z5630/W/20/3260562) is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:C0420 - T - Site SurveyAD19-AP1-1001 - Existing Plans and ElevationsAD19-AP1-1002 - Existing and Proposed Site/Block PlanAD19-AP1-1003 Rev E - Proposed Ground Floor and Landscape PlanAD19-AP1-1004 - Proposed First and Second Floor PlansAD19-AP1-1005 Rev A - Proposed Roof PlanAD19-AP1-1006 Rev B - Proposed Front and Side ElevationsAD19-AP1-1007 Rev A - Proposed Rear and Side ElevationsAD19-AP1-1008 Rev A - Proposed SectionsAD19-AP1-1009 Rev B - Proposed Front Street SceneAD19-AP1-1010 Rev B- Proposed Elevations Showing Boundary TreatmentReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
